title: Designer: expand brain editor interactions
description: Add richer Designer capabilities: canvas-based neuron layout and pan/zoom, mouse-drawn axon routing with visual edges, region paging for large neuron counts, and support for exporting NBS snapshots from edited brains.

title: Designer spawn: HiveMind placement + shard splitting
description: Wire Designer spawn to HiveMind-managed placement (spawn BrainHost, request placement, and let RegionHosts register shards). Implement shard plan options (fixed count / max neurons per shard with stride alignment) and update RegionHost launch to follow shard plan + output sink routing.

title: Designer: Surface validation results near Validate button
description: Validation results should be visible near the Validate button, not only at the bottom of the page.

title: Designer: Add help text for functions and params
description: Provide definitions/tooltips for activation/reset/accum functions and explain Param A/B and thresholds.

title: Designer: Disable Param A/B inputs when unused
description: Disable Param A/Param B inputs for functions that do not use them.
close_reason: Resolved in Designer panel UI updates

title: Designer: Keep axon link button visually active when mode is on
description: Axon link button should remain highlighted and possibly change text while link mode is active.
close_reason: Axon link button stays highlighted via bound accent styling and toggled label.

comments.author: Hailey Collet

title: Designer: Combine Cost/Energy checkbox in Snapshot Defaults
description: Snapshot Defaults should use a single Cost+Energy toggle instead of separate checkboxes.

title: Designer: Fix region canvas not updating for new/other neurons
description: Resolve region canvas issues where only the selected neuron renders and new neurons do not appear until selection changes/zoom; verify paging logic.

title: Designer: Add spawn brain action with validation and host startup
description: Add a Designer option to spawn the current brain; require validation (auto-run if needed) and fail if validation fails; ensure HiveMind handles sharding/placement; start RegionHost(s) if none are running with configurable options.
notes: Groundwork in progress: added spawn options + RegionHost detection scaffolding.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Plan: 1) Add Designer spawn options model + UI (placement mode, RegionHost start policy, shard plan/limits). 2) Build spawn planner that auto-runs validation, parses options, and checks Settings node list for RegionHosts; auto-start locals if none. 3) Wire HiveMind-managed placement + shard splitting (stride-aligned), then refine RegionHost launch + output sink wiring.

title: Designer: Clarify or remove Tick input in Snapshot Details
description: The Tick field in Snapshot Details is unclear; clarify its meaning or remove it.
close_reason: Resolved in Designer panel UI updates

title: Designer: Add clear/reset brain action with export confirmation
description: Provide a clear/reset brain option that confirms if current state has not been exported.

title: Designer: Add axon link destination labels for cross-region/page
description: When an axon targets another region or page, show a small label at the line end indicating destination.

title: Designer: Explain Brain Seed in Brain Setup
description: Add help text or tooltip to explain what Brain Seed does.

title: Designer: Add New Random Brain flow with options
description: Add a New Random Brain action with configurable region count and neuron/axon generation options (likely via popup or dedicated card).
notes: Plan: 1) Centralize random-brain settings in a RandomBrainOptions VM (seed, IO sizes, strength/connectivity + advanced placeholders). 2) Wire basic options into generation with validation and guardrails for unsupported advanced modes. 3) Expand Designer UI to surface basic + advanced option sections; follow-up will implement region selection, range modes, function/threshold distributions, and target bias.

title: Random brain defaults to fixed functions/zero ranges
description: Random brain generation uses Fixed modes by default (Activation=ACT_TANH id 11, Reset=RESET_ZERO id 0, Accumulation=ACCUM_SUM id 0) and Threshold/Param ranges default to 0..0. This yields all-zero thresholds/params and identical functions across all neurons, producing mostly zero output unless manual inputs are sent. Consider switching defaults to Random/Weighted for functions and non-zero ranges for thresholds/params, or clarify in UI.

title: Workspace canvas neurons overlap/stack
description: Designer workspace canvas still shows only one neuron because nodes render on top of each other (overlapping text labels). Investigate layout/spacing so multiple neurons are visible.

title: Designer: Default activation function to ACT_TANH
description: Use ACT_TANH as the default activation function for new neurons.
close_reason: Resolved in Designer panel UI updates

title: Designer: Fix Zoom input/slider layout in region canvas
description: Zoom input and slider overflow card and label overlaps; fix alignment.

title: Designer: Auto-exit axon link mode on completion
description: After creating an axon link (or re-clicking source), exit link mode or reset selection to make behavior clear.
